WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 17.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM 70 FOOT S/V SORCA,
THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, IN 40-40.27N 063-48.11W
AT 010700Z NOV. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC BOSTON, PHONE: 617 223 8555,
E-MAIL: RCCBOSTON@USCG.MIL.
